original_title: Irma - Era Uma Vez No Sert√£o
overview: In the Brazilian backlands, the Ferreira family were murdered by a foreman ordered by a local farmer. 15 years later, an outsider arrives in the same city. Her name: Irma. In revenge, she runs through the city trying to recognize the space and its antagonists.
title: Irma: Once Upon a Time in Backlands
